text: Faculty of Human Geography and Planning is one of the faculties of the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań. It was established in 2019, during the reform of the university. Previously, it was part of the Faculty of Geographic and Geological Sciences, and functioned under the name of the Institute of Socio- Economic Geography and Spatial Management. It is located in the building of the Collegium Geographicum in Poznań. == References == Category:Poznań
title: Faculty of Human Geography and Planning, Adam Mickiewicz University, Poznań
